Improvements.Improvement: Use the ternary operator for setting the URL
Improvements.Description: Instead of using the ternary operator in the argument of the setUrl() method, it would be better to use it to decide the value to be passed, improving readability.

Currently, there are multiple calls to CollectionUtil.isNotEmpty() method for the same collection (apiMethodDoc.getQueryParams()). This is inefficient and can be improved by storing the result in a boolean variable and reusing it.
